20101217074048.500|20101217074051.000|CCO|THEM AS BIG MEGAN.

20101217074056.000|20101217074058.500|CCO|AND DENTAL AND THE FORENSIC 
20101217074058.500|20101217074101.000|CCO|TIMES ARE ALL COMPLETE.
20101217074101.000|20101217074103.000|CCO|>> Reporter: THAT'S WHERE THIS 
20101217074103.000|20101217074105.000|CCO|DOCTOR COMES IN.
20101217074105.000|20101217074107.000|CCO|BUT THE MEDICAL EXAMINER ADMITS 
20101217074107.000|20101217074109.000|CCO|IT COULD TAKE WEEKS OR MONTHS.
20101217074109.000|20101217074111.000|CCO|HOW DO YOU GO ABOUT IDENTIFYING 
20101217074111.000|20101217074113.000|CCO|SUCH BADLY DECOMPOSED BODIES?
20101217074113.000|20101217074115.000|CCO|>> WELL, GENERALLY, YOU KNOW, WE
20101217074115.000|20101217074117.000|CCO|CAN NO LONGER IDENTIFY THEM OR 
20101217074117.000|20101217074119.000|CCO|CLASSIFY THEM BY LOOKING AT THEM
20101217074119.000|20101217074121.000|CCO|JUST VISUALLY, SO, WE NEED TO GO
20101217074121.000|20101217074123.500|CCO|TODENTISTRY AND THE STUDY OF 
20101217074123.500|20101217074126.000|CCO|BONES AND THE SKELETON.
20101217074126.000|20101217074128.500|CCO|AND THEN THE LAST STEP IS TO DO 
20101217074128.500|20101217074131.000|CCO|THE DNA ANALYSIS.
20101217074131.000|20101217074132.667|CCO|>> Reporter: AS POLICE IN NEW 
20101217074132.667|20101217074134.333|CCO|YORK CONTINUE THEIR 
20101217074134.333|20101217074136.000|CCO|INVESTIGATION, THEY'RE ALSO 
20101217074136.000|20101217074137.667|CCO|WORKING WITH DETECTIVES 160 
20101217074137.667|20101217074139.333|CCO|MILES AWAY IN ATLANTIC CITY.
20101217074139.333|20101217074141.000|CCO|IN 2006, FOUR PROSTITUTES THERE 
20101217074141.000|20101217074142.429|CCO|WERE MURDERED.
20101217074142.429|20101217074143.857|CCO|THEIR BODIES FOUND LYING IN A 
20101217074143.857|20101217074145.286|CCO|DRAINAGE DITCH.
20101217074145.286|20101217074146.714|CCO|THE CASE HAS NEVER BEEN SOLVED.
20101217074146.714|20101217074148.143|CCO|ATTORNEY JAMES LEONARD 
20101217074148.143|20101217074149.571|CCO|REPRESENTS TERRY OLSON, A 
20101217074149.571|20101217074151.000|CCO|HANDYMAN WHO WAS INVESTIGATED 
20101217074151.000|20101217074152.429|CCO|FOR THE CRIMES BUT WAS NEVER 
20101217074152.429|20101217074153.857|CCO|CHARGED AND DENIES ANY 
20101217074153.857|20101217074155.286|CCO|INVOLVEMENT.
20101217074155.286|20101217074156.714|CCO|>> THE FACT THAT WE'RE DEALING 
20101217074156.714|20101217074158.143|CCO|WITH FOUR WOMEN THAT WERE 
20101217074158.143|20101217074159.571|CCO|DISPOSED OF AND IT WOULD APPEAR 
20101217074159.571|20101217074201.000|CCO|THAT AT LEAST ONE OF THEM HAS 
20101217074201.000|20101217074202.667|CCO|CONNECTIONS TO PROSTITUTION, SO,
20101217074202.667|20101217074204.333|CCO|THE SIMILARITIES, TO ME, ARE 
20101217074204.333|20101217074206.000|CCO|STRIKING.
20101217074206.000|20101217074207.667|CCO|>> PROSTITUTES, OBVIOUSLY, ARE 
20101217074207.667|20101217074209.333|CCO|EASY PREY.
20101217074209.333|20101217074211.000|CCO|THEY ARE PEOPLE THAT MANY TIMES 
20101217074211.000|20101217074212.429|CCO|ARE NOT READILY IDENTIFIED 
20101217074212.429|20101217074213.857|CCO|BECAUSE THEY ARE LIVING UNDER 
20101217074213.857|20101217074215.286|CCO|ALIASES, THEY'RE FROM AROUND 
20101217074215.286|20101217074216.714|CCO|CITY, THEY'RE TRANSIENT.
20101217074216.714|20101217074218.143|CCO|AND WHAT HAPPENS IS, ALSO, MANY 
20101217074218.143|20101217074219.571|CCO|SERIAL KILLERS HAVE ISSUES WITH 
20101217074219.571|20101217074221.000|CCO|WOMEN.
20101217074221.000|20101217074222.667|CCO|AND THEY BELIEVE PROSTITUTES ARE
20101217074222.667|20101217074224.333|CCO|EVIL AND WE SHOULD RID SOCIETY 
20101217074224.333|20101217074226.000|CCO|OF THEM.
20101217074226.000|20101217074227.667|CCO|>> Reporter: COMMISSIONER DORMER
